translation: Even those devotees who, endowed with faith, worship other gods, worship Me alone, O Arjuna, but by the wrong method.
commentary: 9.23 Ye who? Even even? Other gods other gods? devotees devotees? Yajante worship? Shraddhaya with faith? Anvitaá¸¥ endowed? And they? Even also? Maam Me? Eve alone? Kaunteya Or Kaunteya? Yajanti worship? unlawfully by the wrong method.Commentary They worship Me in ignorance. Their mode of worship is contrary to the ancient,rule. Hence they return to this world.People worship Agni? Indra? Surya? Men? the
